posts.postText:
Offender name?:Red Herring
Which Server?:TTT
Offender's Steam ID?:STEAM_0:1:8407199
What the Offender did?:Me and him were stuck inside of each other, and I barely got him out with magnet stick when he started crowbarring me to death, then more people came through and he gave them the same treatment. Then we find out he was a traitor which made it a little better, but he still was the cause of death for two of his T buddies.
Admins on?:Nope.
Proof?:
 http://i162.photobucket.com/albums/t245/kennyd3333/RedHerring1.jpg
